SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am01
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.model.game.selectionphase

Interface SelectionPhaseStrategy<O,I>

Type Parameters:
O - the type of the options.
I - the type that represents the identity of the "choosers".
All Known Implementing Classes:
CommonPoolSelectionStrategy, DisjointSelectionStrategy
public interface SelectionPhaseStrategy<O,I>
This strategy is responsible for
  • determining what options are available to each selector in the SelectionPhase
  • whether the selectors are allowed to change the expressed preference
  • determining when the SelectionPhase can be considered concluded

  • Method Details

    • createSelectors

      List<SelectionPhase<O,I>.Selector> createSelectors(SelectionPhase<O,I> selectionPhase)
      Creates the selector for the SelectionPhase
      Parameters:
      selectionPhase - the instance of SelectionPhase that is requesting that the selector be created.
      Returns:
      a list of selectors
      See Also:
      • invalid reference 
        SelectionPhase#getSelectorFor(I)

    • tryConclude

      Optional<Map<I,O>> tryConclude(List<SelectionPhase<O,I>.Selector> selectors)
      Determines whether the SelectionPhase should be considered concluded.

      If this method returns and empty Optional, then the SelectionPhase is not considered concluded. If the optional is not empty the SelectionPhase is considered concluded and the contents of the optional are used as the results of the selection.

      Parameters:
      selectors - the list of selector associated with this SelectionPhase. (This is the list that was previously returned by createSelectors(SelectionPhase))
      Returns:
      An optional that will be used to decide whether the selection phase is concluded and what its results are.
      See Also:
      • SelectionPhase.isConcluded()
      • SelectionPhase.getResults()
